name: GB's Guide (To Life + After) [DEMO]
description:
In this visual novel, you play as Zoe, a disillusioned teen just trying to make it through a weekend of dog-sitting. Along the way, you encounter a bubbly teenage ghost, GB. Through your choices, you can learn more about his back story, yourself, and maybe even life (and whatever’s next).

This ten minutes(ish) demo was created for Cornish College of the Arts Virtual Design BFA Showcase 2021: https://www.cornishdesign2021.com/

This is my first visual novel EVER! All visual, written, and coded assets were created by me over the course of January – April 2021. All other sources are credited below. Let me know what you think in the comments!

(Please scroll to the bottom for full game links.)
